original_text: Jacob saw that it was Joseph's coat. He said, ‘It is my son's coat! A wild animal must have eaten him! The animal has torn Joseph's body into pieces.’
korean_text: 아버지가 그것을 알아보고 이르되 내 아들의 옷이라 악한 짐승이 그를 잡아 먹었도다 요셉이 분명히 찢겼도다 하고

sentences.original_text: Jacob saw that it was Joseph's coat.
He said, 'It is my son's coat!'
A wild animal must have eaten him!
The animal has torn Joseph's body into pieces.'
sentences.korean_translation: 그 동물이 요셉의 몸을 찢어 조각 냈다.'
